name: CEO
description: Chief Executive Officer - Responsible for overall company strategy and operations

name: CTO
description: Chief Technology Officer - Leads technology strategy and innovation

name: CFO
description: Chief Financial Officer - Manages financial planning and risk management

name: COO
description: Chief Operating Officer - Oversees day-to-day administrative and operational functions

name: HR Director
description: Human Resources Director - Manages HR policies, recruiting, and employee relations

name: Project Manager
description: Technology Project Manager - Oversees technology projects and teams

name: Product Owner
description: Product Owner - Responsible for maximizing product value and managing the product backlog

name: Tech Lead
description: Technical Lead - Provides technical guidance and leadership to development teams

name: Frontend Developer
description: Frontend Developer - Builds user interfaces and client-side applications

name: Backend Developer
description: Backend Developer - Develops server-side logic and databases

name: DevOps Engineer
description: DevOps Engineer - Manages infrastructure and deployment pipelines

name: QA Engineer
description: Quality Assurance Engineer - Ensures software quality through testing

name: Scrum Master
description: Scrum Master - Facilitates agile processes and removes impediments

name: Chief Accountant
description: Chief Accountant - Oversees accounting operations and financial reporting

name: Financial Analyst
description: Financial Analyst - Analyzes financial data and prepares reports

name: Accounts Payable
description: Accounts Payable Specialist - Manages vendor payments and expenses

name: Internal Audit
description: Internal Auditor - Evaluates financial and operational controls

name: Product Manager
description: Product Manager - Defines product vision and roadmap

name: Operations Manager
description: Operations Manager - Ensures efficient business operations

name: Customer Relations
description: Customer Relations Manager - Manages customer relationships and satisfaction
